page.title: 13VILLAGE SHOPS, CALDER VALE
page.content:
There are not many shops in this block and most people go to Garstang (5 miles), Preston (12 miles), or Lancaster (12 miles).
In Calder Vale there are two shops.
{Post Office:}This sells sweets, cards, newspapers, and ice-cream. It is right in the middle of the Village near the bridge.
{Village Store:}The Village Store sells fresh meat, fresh fruit, frozen foods, and groceries. There are two people who work in the Village Store. It was once called the co-op, and was nearly closed down but somebody bought it and people like going there.
